name: Test - create provisioning record and get id
statusTrace:
self = <testcase.ACS.test_provisioning_record.TestProvisioningRecord object at 0x000001D2C19D5D50>
base_api = <utils.base_api_acs.BaseAPIACS object at 0x000001D2C59C6440>
file_path = './testdata/ACS/provisioning_record_voice_SIP.json'

    @allure.title('Test - create provisioning record and get id')
    @pytest.mark.parametrize('file_path',[file_paths["service_off"],file_paths["H248"],file_paths["tdmgw"],file_paths["sip"],file_paths["mgcp"]])
    # @pytest.mark.parametrize('file_path',[file_paths["service_off"]])
    def test_crud(self,base_api,file_path):
        json_data = load_json(file_path)
        response_create = base_api.create_when_exist(endpoint,file_path,{"deviceId": "CXNK00AFB83B"},params=None)
        assert response_create.status_code == 200
        model_id = response_create.json()['_id']
        print("the diff as following:" , DeepDiff(json_data,response_create.json()))
    
    
       # get info by id
        response_get = base_api.get_by_id(endpoint,model_id)
        assert response_get.status_code == 200
        assert response_get.json()['_id'] == model_id
    
        model = endpoint.replace('-', '_')
        expected_file_path = f"./testdata/ACS/outputs/get_{model}_by_id.json"
        print(f"the saved/expected file path is {expected_file_path}")
        if base_api.env == "aws":
          save_file(expected_file_path,response_get.json())
        else:
          expected_response = load_json(expected_file_path)
          print("the diff as following:" , DeepDiff(expected_response,response_get.json()))
    
        # update the record
        json_data = load_json(file_paths["data_dhcp"])
        response_put = base_api.update(endpoint,model_id,json_data,False,"deviceId")
        assert response_put.status_code == 200
        # aws return 200 and null body when put configuration profile
        if base_api.env != "aws":
          assert response_put.json()['_id'] == model_id
          print("the diff as following:" , DeepDiff(json_data,response_put.json()))
    
        # get record by parameters
        response_get = base_api.get_list_by_param(endpoint,{"deviceId": "CXNK00AFB83B"})
        assert response_get.status_code == 200
        body = response_get.json()[0]
        body["video"]["Enable"] = True
    
        # update the record by query
        response_put = base_api.update_with_query(endpoint,body)
        assert response_get.status_code == 200
        if base_api.env != "aws":
          assert response_put.json()["video"]["Enable"] == True
    
    
    
        # update apply-pppoe
        endpoint_apply_pppoe = "provisioning-record/apply-pppoe"
        json_data=None
        response_put = base_api.update(endpoint_apply_pppoe,model_id,json_data,need_random=False, field=None)
>       assert response_put.status_code == 200
E       assert 404 == 200
E        +  where 404 = <Response [404]>.status_code

testcase\ACS\test_provisioning_record.py:141: AssertionError
